data.prayer: Father, help the 33,849 believers in Tirunelveli to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Tirunelveli are far from Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu, India.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Tirunelveli, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Brahmin Tamil people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Brahmin Tamil people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Brahmin Tamil people is yours.
Spirit, encourage the church of Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

location.name: Tirunelveli
location.people_groups_list: Mukkari, Eravallan, Mukkuvan (Hindu traditions), Karumpuram, Valan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mukkari (1,900), Eravallan (7,700), Mukkuvan (Hindu traditions) (158,000), Karumpuram (100), Valan (91,000)
